prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GreenThumb Weekly
Title: Urban Gardening: Transforming Your Apartment into a Vegetable Haven
Description: Learn the basics of urban gardening and how you can cultivate your own fresh vegetables, herbs, and plants right in your apartment. No yard needed!
Yes, I would enjoy reading that particular article.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Galactic Gazette 
Title: Extraterrestrial Life: A Detailed Analysis of the Probability and Consequences
Description: Dive deep into the fascinating world of astrobiology as we examine the likelihood of extraterrestrial life, and explore possible ramifications for humanity and our understanding of the universe.
Yes, I'm curious about the possibility of extraterrestrial life.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Foodie's Paradise 
Title: The Art of Sourdough: A Deep Dive into the Science of Fermentation 
Description: Join us on a culinary journey as we explore the intricate process of fermentation in bread-making, specifically focusing on the artisanal craft of sourdough. We'll cover everything from starter culture to the perfect crust.
No, fermentation isn't anything that I'm curious about.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptoSphere 
Title: Blockchain for Beginners: A Simple Explanation of Complex Technology 
Description: Unravel the complexities of blockchain technology with our easy-to-understand guide. We cover everything from its inception, its potential impacts on the global economy, to its role in cryptocurrency. Perfect for beginners and experts alike.
No, I don't like anything to do with blockchain technology. I can't understand it.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MotionMastery 
Title: The Science and Art of Dance: Exploring Ballet Through a Biomechanical Lens 
Description: Venture into the world of professional ballet from a scientific perspective. This article combines the elegance of dance with the principles of physics and biomechanics to explain the human body's incredible capabilities and resilience. From understanding the physics of pirouettes to the anatomy of a ballerina's pointe, this article offers a unique interdisciplinary exploration.
No, I'm not interested in anything to do with ballet Or dancing.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Adventure Chronicles
Title: Solo Travel in Antarctica: A Survival Guide for the Intrepid Explorer
Description: Embark on the journey of a lifetime as we guide you through the icy wilderness of Antarctica. This article covers all aspects of solo travel in the most remote continent on Earth, including wildlife encounters, extreme weather survival tips, and historical sites of exploration. Perfect for those with a thirst for adventure and a love for the great outdoors.
Yeah, anything to do with traveling, especially Antarctica sounds pretty interesting.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Quantum Physics Daily
Title: Quantum Entanglement for the Layman: A Beginner's Guide to the World of Subatomic Particles
Description: Explore the fascinating concept of quantum entanglement in this beginner-friendly guide. Understand how particles can be 'entangled' across vast distances and learn about its potential implications for future technologies. If you've ever been curious about the mysterious world of quantum physics, this article is your perfect starting point.
Yeah, I'm curious about quantum mechanics, especially for a beginner.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtisanCraftsmanship
Title: The Renaissance of Traditional Watchmaking: A Journey into the Art and Science of Horology
Description: Delve into the captivating world of mechanical timepieces, preserved by the hands of master craftsmen. This article covers the historical evolution of watchmaking, the intricate mechanics of timepieces, and the resurgence of traditional methods in the digital age. Perfect for those who are passionate about the blend of artistry and scientific precision.
Not really, Watch making sounds like something too far in the past to be relevant.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SocietalInnovations
Title: The Intersection of AI and Human Rights: Ethical Considerations for a Digital Future
Description: This article delves into the complex relationship between artificial intelligence and human rights. It outlines potential ethical dilemmas and proposes solutions for these challenges. From data privacy to algorithmic bias, it explores the societal impact of AI and how we can ensure a fair and inclusive digital future.
The digital future and it's ethical considerations sound important as well as interesting.

feedback.feedback_other: I use bing chat quite a bit

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
